Name: Death and the Fly
About the game: Players will control two very different characters, Death and the Fly. Each character has special skills that must be used to navigate the many traps and puzzles contained in each level. With many interesting ways to die and numerous opponents to face, the player will be challenged and entertained for hours. Key features: Unique, grotesque design. Unique graphics. Unique music. Two different characters to control, each with his own skills. Traps and bonuses. Side-scrolling 2D platform puzzle game. Earn gold for the in-game shop Power-up skills. Many deaths. Many flies. Many different opponents. Many hours of play.
